body: Hi Eduard, Then it should work fine. Do you have Autosave on in Grasshopper settings? That might be the reason that slows down the grasshopper file as grasshopper by default saves your file at each and every change that you make. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/QJkcLaPnc6*LSenFTDfJJ5nNHSg6zYSTtu3X4raMXVGz7fgBJKzYWQXW9xfjjwLWpmjf2hW3pk2x-TQKkW6Gl4wjHdxJN4pO/AutoSave.PNG)
